response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value to you, we believe it's only fair to extend this offer at a price that reflects its true worth while ensuring a mutually beneficial transaction. We kindly propose a purchase price of $950,000. This offer is tailored to maximize your satisfaction and return on investment, considering the product's significant value to you. We look forward to discussing this further and hope to facilitate a successful transaction. Please let us know if you have any questions or require additional information.", "product_price": 950000}
